messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: introductions/Crystal
messages.msgSnippet: Get Sean the Teenage Liberation Handbook, I read it and wished so much someone would have shared it with me as a teen! (if it was even out waaaaay back then.
messages.messageBody:
Get Sean the Teenage Liberation Handbook, I read it and wished so much someone would have shared it with me as a teen! (if it was even out waaaaay back then.  I think it was and there is a new revised edition of it out)
  I don't like it when we moms get blamed for everything, and we do. Or so it seems to me. 
OH to be a kid again and be able to draw when I want to!  Thats ALL I ever wanted to do, I hated school, but no one knew any different then.  Your daughter is SO lucky!
syndi
 
We worry about what a child will be tomorrow, yet we forget that he
is someone today.
Stacia Tauscher
